description: This script generates an OpenAPI specification for a FastAPI application by importing the app, invoking its openapi() method, and writing the resulting schema to a JSON file. It also ensures the output directory exists and performs basic validation of the generated schema.

methods.name: _generate_openapi_dict
methods.description: Builds and returns the OpenAPI dictionary from the FastAPI app.

methods.name: _write_openapi
methods.description: Writes the OpenAPI schema as pretty-printed JSON to the specified output path.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that orchestrates the generation and saving of the OpenAPI schema.
